title: Land Lease Agreement Management
description: A land manager needs to track and manage upcoming payments for dozens of land lease agreements for a solar project.

tasks.description: Scan the database of all land lease agreements and identify all payments due in the next 90 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a list of 15 upcoming payments with amounts and due dates.

tasks.description: For each payment, verify the landowner's contact and payment information is up to date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms all information is current.

tasks.description: Generate payment authorization requests for the finance department for all due payments.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates and submits all necessary payment requests.
